about_the_game:
Get ready to rev up your engines and race your way to victory in Volt Recharge! Take control of customizable RC cars and compete against friends or rivals in adrenaline-pumping multiplayer races. With split-screen support, you can challenge your friends head-to-head from the comfort of your couch or dive into intense online competitions.

* Thrilling Multiplayer Races: Jump into action-packed races against players from around the world or challenge your friends in split-screen multiplayer mode.

* Customizable RC Cars: Personalize your RC car with a wide range of customization options, from paint schemes to performance upgrades, and show off your unique style on the track.

* Unique Abilities: Gain an edge over your opponents with a variety of special abilities and power-ups scattered throughout the tracks. Strategize and use them wisely to outmaneuver your rivals and secure victory.

* Dynamic Tracks: Race across a variety of dynamic tracks, each with its own twists, turns, and obstacles to keep you on your toes. From winding city streets to treacherous off-road trails, every race offers a new challenge.

* Responsive Controls: Experience tight and responsive controls that put you in full command of your RC car's every move. Master the art of drifting, cornering, and boosting to leave your competition in the dust.

Get ready to experience the ultimate RC racing experience with Volt Recharge! Gather your friends, customize your ride, and dominate the competition on the track.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4460 or Core™ i3 9100F or AMD FX™-6300 or Ryzen™ 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA®GeForce®GTX 760 or GTX1050 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x or RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or later)
  • Additional Notes: These specs allow for the game to be played in 1080p/30fps with graphics settings at "Low". - 64-bit processor and operating system are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 or Core™ i3 8350 or Core™ i3 9350F / AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X or Ryzen™ 5 3400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060 (VRAM 8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or later)
  • Additional Notes: These specs allow for the game to be played in 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "High". - 64-bit processor and operating system are required.
